caption:
𝐂𝐚𝐧 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐧 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐄𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐚 𝐆𝐥𝐨𝐛𝐚𝐥 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐬𝐞?

With Indian universities expanding globally and more international students choosing India, the future of Indian higher ed is brighter than ever. 🌟

Join moderator Rishab Mehta and a distinguished panel of speakers, including Chaitanya Kalipatnapu, Atul Khosla and Sahil Chalana, at the ASU+GSV & Emeritus Summit as they explore India’s potential to lead the world’s education stage and reshape the global academic landscape.

🎟️ Register now: https://emrt.us/eag25li
📅 February 3–5, 2025
📍 Gurgaon, India

Let’s explore how India can emerge as a global education hub. Don’t miss it!

#ASUGSVEmeritusSummit #HigherEd #EducationInnovation
